page.title: 15TODAY'S VILLAGE BOBBY
page.content: Creech Heathfield has a police house where the village bobby lives with his family. The traditional image of the village bobby is a jolly chap seen doing his beat on his bicycle;he attends fetes, etc and makes house calls to introduce himself and to get to know his wards. Today's bobby has not got the time to do this.He is part of Taunton Constab- ulary.Although based at Creech,he gets sent all over Taunton.Any trouble in the village will be radioed to him.He patrols the village in his 1.3 litre Ford Escort.He works alternate shifts: 6am until 2pm;2 until 10pm and nights. Villagers are expected to phone the Taunton station so the police house number is not in the phone book.Vill- agers have been known to call on him, but this is rare.He gets more calls from travellers,asking for directions.
